import React,{useState}from"react";import{Box,Typography,Button}from"@mui/material";import ValidationKPIs from"./ValidationKPIs";import{BACKEND_URL}from"../utils/backend";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Validation(){const[running,setRunning]=useState(false);const[runMsg,setRunMsg]=useState("");const[refresh,setRefresh]=useState(0);const handleRunWorkflow=async()=>{setRunning(true);setRunMsg("");try{const res=await fetch("".concat(BACKEND_URL,"/run-validation"),{method:"POST"});const data=await res.json();setRunMsg(data.status==="success"?"Validation workflow completed!":"Workflow failed.");setRefresh(r=>r+1);// trigger refresh
}catch(e){setRunMsg("Error running workflow.");}setRunning(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',mb:2,justifyContent:'space-between'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h5",fontWeight:600,children:"Discrepancy Validator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:handleRunWorkflow,disabled:running,children:running?"Running...":"Run Workflow"})]}),runMsg&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{color:"secondary",mb:2,children:runMsg}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ValidationKPIs,{refresh:refresh})]});}export default Validation;
